turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Then let's try again with the same topic.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, let's do it! Whenever you're ready, we can jump right back into the scenario, and I'll be here to help you practice again.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Hi, I'm here at the police station because I need to report my lost wallet.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, I’m here to help. Let’s get started. Could you first tell me a bit about the wallet, like its color and any distinctive features?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: The color is yellow.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, a yellow with the rectangle shape.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Perfect, a yellow rectangular wallet. That’s really helpful. Could you also let me know when and where you last had your wallet, and what you were doing at that time?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I don't remember because when I came back to my hotel, I just realized I lost my wallet.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I see, no worries at all. That’s still helpful to know. In that case, could you tell me the name of the hotel and the approximate time you noticed it was missing? That’ll help us narrow things down.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I arrived at my hotel at 3 p.m. so it because happened before 3 p.m.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No problem at all, Got it, that helps a lot. So, it was before 3 p.m. at your hotel. One more thing: could you let me know if there were any important items inside the wallet, like credit cards or ID, just so we have a complete picture?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Oh yeah, inside the wallet, it's including my ID, and my credit card, and some cash.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks for sharing that. That definitely helps us in identifying the wallet and protecting your items. If there's anything else you can think of, just let me know, and we’ll make sure to get everything sorted out.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yeah, I think I dropped it in the library.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, that’s really helpful to know. We’ll definitely focus on the library area as well. If you have any specific details about where in the library you think you might have left it, that would be great. Otherwise, we’ll do our best to track it down.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I just take a picture of me and my friend in front of the library, so it might be there.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That’s a great clue! We’ll definitely check that area thoroughly. Thank you for the details. If you think of anything else, just let me know, and we’ll make sure we do everything we can to help you out.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Okay, then can I leave my contact details?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, that would be perfect. Feel free to share your contact details, and we’ll make sure to reach out if we find anything. Let’s get that sorted.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Okay, here's my contact number and what happens if someone finds it.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great, thank you for that. If someone finds it, we’ll contact you right away using the information you provided. We’ll also keep you updated on any developments. And if it’s not found, we’ll guide you on the next steps to take.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Do I need to fill out the form?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, we’ll just need a brief form with some details about the wallet and your contact info. It won’t take long at all, and then we’ll have everything on record. Let’s get that done, and we’ll be all set.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Can you call me if it's found and do I need to show my ID card when collecting it?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we’ll give you a call as soon as we have it. And yes, when you come to collect it, just bring your ID so we can verify that it’s really yours. That way, everything will go smoothly.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Thank you for today. It's really helped.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re very welcome! I’m glad I could help. If you need anything else, just let me know. Take care, and I hope everything works out well!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Thank you. See you tomorrow.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're welcome! See you tomorrow, and take care until then!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Okay, how was this conversation?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I think it went really well! You did a fantastic job providing details and keeping the conversation natural. It’s great practice, and if you ever want to run through it again or try different scenarios, I’m here to help!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: And I think that is enough for today.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, that sounds good! I'm glad we could practice, and if you need anything in the future, just let me know. Have a great day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! Take care, and I'll be here whenever you need me. Have a wonderful day! Week 3 –
